metadata.name: DNS Query Tor .Onion Address - Sysmon
metadata.comment: Detects DNS queries to an ".onion" address related to Tor routing networks

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM dns_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('.onion')))

output.summary: Detects DNS queries to an ".onion" address related to Tor routing networks
